column4: Is it normal for a minimal install of ubuntu to get get stuck at 2% on "Select and Install Software" -- it just says "Please Wait"
it sometimes happen to me too. I had to start all over again when that happens
would you recommend a mirror to use? the defualt us.ubuntu.... is hella slow
uh, I use japan mirror because I'm in japan.... us.ubuntu will look for the optimal server for you, but you can set the mirror manually.
